thread.title: Beyonc√© bows out of Coachella performance due to pregnancy
thread.title_full: Beyonc√© bows out of Coachella performance due to pregnancy - Feb. 23, 2017

author: Frank Pallotta
title: Beyonc√© bows out of Coachella performance due to pregnancy
text:
Beyonce, Adele rule Grammy nominations Well, Beyonc√© fans, when life gives you lemons, right? Beyonc√© will not perform at this year's Coachella Valley Music & Arts Festival because the singer is pregnant with twins, the festival announced on its Facebook. 
"Following the advice of her doctors to keep a less rigorous schedule in the coming months, Beyonc√© has made the decision to forgo performing at the 2017 Coachella Valley Music & Arts Festival," read the statement on the festival's Facebook page. 
The singer was set to perform over two weekends at the festival on April 15 and 22. 
It's not all bad news for fans. The festival announced that the singer will be the headliner at next year's festival. 

Coachella did not say who would take over for Beyonc√© this year. 
The other headliners at this year's festival, which takes place in Indio, California, will be Radiohead and rapper Kendrick Lamar. 
Beyonc√©'s fans, known as "the BeyHive," conveyed their displeasure over the cancellation on social media. 
Related: Beyonc√© is pregnant with twins 
"Beyonc√© isn't performing at Coachella now and I'm praying they find someone better or equally as good as her or I'm demanding a refund," tweeted one user. 
Beyonc√© isn't performing at Coachella now and I'm praying they find someone better or equally as good as her or I'm demanding a refundüòÖ
‚Äî Kaley Stockton (@k leyyy) February 23, 2017 
Another Twitter user wrote, "I literally only bought a Coachella ticket for Beyonc√©. This is stupid. Who wants my ticket?!" 
I literally only bought a Coachella ticket for Beyonc√©. This is stupid. Who wants my ticket?!
‚Äî Amanda Castillo (@ACastillo121) February 23, 2017 
The singer, who is married to rapper Jay Z, had her album "Lemonade" nominated for album of the year at this year's Grammys. 
She surprised the world earlier this month when she announced on Instagram that she was pregnant with twins. 
CNNMoney (New York)   4:23 PM ET
